name: RUM Viewer
description: View Real User Monitoring session data from active pages with session replay links and user information
author: Datadog Sales Engineering Team

maxWaitTime.title: Max Wait Time (ms)
maxWaitTime.description: Maximum time to wait for DD_RUM to become available

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (ms)
pollingInterval.description: How often to check for DD_RUM availability

autoRefresh.title: Auto Refresh Data
autoRefresh.description: Automatically refresh RUM data when popup is opened

showUserInfo.title: Show User Information
showUserInfo.description: Display user information when available in RUM sessions

showSessionReplay.title: Show Session Replay Links
showSessionReplay.description: Display session replay links when available

enableLogging.title: Enable Debug Logging
enableLogging.description: Enable verbose logging for debugging RUM data collection
